sentences.en: Alpha-Bravo-Zulu 643 to Saltezar, do you read me? Over.
sentences.cn: 阿尔法－布拉沃－祖鲁643呼叫萨德扎，能听到我的声音吗？完毕。

sentences.en: Be sure to read about how mozzarella is made, on page 65.
sentences.cn: 务必看看莫泽雷勒干酪是怎么制成的，在第65页。

sentences.en: children who are just learning to read and write
sentences.cn: 刚刚开始学习读和写的儿童

sentences.en: He skimmed the pages quickly, then read them again more carefully.
sentences.cn: 他先快速地浏览页面，然后再细细阅读。

sentences.en: He was read out of the secretariat after the embarrassing incident.
sentences.cn: 由于那次尴尬的事件，他被从秘书处开除了

sentences.en: Her books are quite widely read (= read by a lot of people ) .
sentences.cn: 她的书读者很多。

sentences.en: I can’t read your writing.
sentences.cn: 我看不懂你写的东西。

sentences.en: I don't know if you ever read any of his books.
sentences.cn: 我不知道你是否读过他写的书。

sentences.en: I just wanted to explore Paris, read Sartre, listen to Sidney Bechet.
sentences.cn: 我就想逛逛巴黎，读读萨特的作品，听听悉尼·贝谢的音乐。

sentences.en: I read Lili a story and tucked her in her own bed.
sentences.cn: 我为莉莉读了个故事，然后给她盖好被子。

sentences.en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
sentences.cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

sentences.en: I would be obliged if you could read it to us.
sentences.cn: 您若能把它读给大家听，我将不胜感激。

sentences.en: I've read up on the dangers of all these drugs.
sentences.cn: 我对所有这些药物的危险性了如指掌。

sentences.en: If you've read my earlier memoirs you'll know all about it.
sentences.cn: 如果你读过我早期的回忆录，就全都明白了。

sentences.en: learned to read between the lines of corporate annual reports to discern areas of fiscal weakness.
sentences.cn: 学会仔细研读公司年度报告，并从中发现财政困难的迹象

sentences.en: Mother read us a lecture after the principal telephoned her.
sentences.cn: 校长打电话后，妈妈批评了我们一顿

sentences.en: Please read out the names on the list.
sentences.cn: 请大声念出名单上的名字

sentences.en: Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.cn: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.en: Read these notes carefully and keep them for future reference.
sentences.cn: 仔细阅读这些注释并将其保留下来以备将来之用。

sentences.en: Read up on the places you plan to visit before you travel.
sentences.cn: 在旅游之前，对你准备前往的地方先作一番调查研究

sentences.en: She picked up the letter and read it.
sentences.cn: 她拿起信读了起来。

sentences.en: she spent the time reading up on antenatal care.
sentences.cn: 她投入时间系统研究产前保健问题。

sentences.en: She strove to read the name on the stone pillar.
sentences.cn: 她费劲地读着石柱上的名字。

sentences.en: The evidence was read out to the court in a dull monotone.
sentences.cn: 证据被当庭呆板地宣读了一遍。

sentences.en: They can neither read nor write, nor can they comprehend such concepts.
sentences.cn: 他们不会读，不会写，也理解不了这样的概念。

sentences.en: Under the shaded light her expression was difficult to read.
sentences.cn: 她的表情隐在阴影中，很难读懂。

sentences.en: was I reading too much into his behaviour?.
sentences.cn: 我是否对他的行为做了过于武断的解释？。

sentences.en: When I was young, I read every one of his books from cover to cover (= read all of something because you are very interested ) .
sentences.cn: 我小时候，他的每一本书我都从头到尾一页不落地看过。

sentences.en: You can’t believe everything you read in the papers.
sentences.cn: 报纸上看到的东西，你不能全都相信。

words.tran_cn: 可读的；易读的；读起来津津有味的
读者人数；读者们；读者的身分

phrases.phrase: read a lecture 或 read a lesson

phrases.tran_cn: 仔细阅读，研究：找出或发现隐藏晦涩的意思
曲解；加上另外的意思于；隐藏某种意义
(北美，非正式)请认真听（用来强调所说的话的重要性或表达说话人迫切的心情）
驱逐，开除：被正式文告从社会、政治或其它集团中驱逐
再读一遍；仔细阅读（等于read through）
了解…的心思（或动机）；对…了如指掌
猜透…的心思，知道…在想些什么
朗读信息（或书面材料）（以检验其准确性）；重念，复述
把…加进对…的理解中去；对…做某种解释
研读：通过阅读进行研究或学习

phrases.phrase: read up on something (或 read something up)
phrases.tran_cn: 研读，攻读；系统地研究（某一科目）
(澳/新西兰，非正式)太离奇了（用来表示怀疑、厌恶、悲伤）

trans.tran_en: if you have a read, you spend time reading
to find out information from books, newspapers etc

trans.tran_cn: 阅读，识字，读懂，朗读，念，读到，查阅到，懂得，理解，写着，显示，听到，学习，攻读，读取文件
trans.tran_en: to look at written words and understand what they mean
